column4: If I want a partition to accesible under windows> Which one should I choose NTFS of FAT32
fat32 is more stable as a sharing directory.  Though the reported chance of ntfs uncompressed unencrypted screwing up is low, it's still a risk to lose files.
you will need at least a crossover lan cable, as a regular lan cable won't work like that.  You can also use a router, or a network hub with appropriate lan cables.
